#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    string s,s1;
    s1 = "";
    int i,l;
    cin >> s;
    l = s.size();
    for(i=0;s[i]!='\0';i++){
            if(s[i] == s[l-i-1]){
                    s1 += s[i];
            }else{
                break;
            }
    }
    cout << s1 << endl;
    return 0;
}
